name: Asylum Go Brrr
description:
Vesti is always alone. Nobody plays with him anymore. Maybe someone's outside to play with him? So Vesti decided to go outside!

Made by students of the htk academy hamburg:

Alexander Schmidt (assets, programming,)

Blagovest Bobchev (programming,)

Colleena Demsey (assets, animations, characters)

Leon Haase (programming,)

Luca Hagen (concept art, assets, character design)

Marvin Wardius (sound design, music)
